content.title: everything is going well
content.creator:
Graziano ScolaroCollaborator
March 7, 2025
content.content:
Good morning, everyone,
we are very happy with how this experience is going, and we thank the supporters who are believing in this project. 
It is a joy to see that there are those who have the willingness and courage to see things different from how they have always been done.
Production is proceeding well and as planned. We expect to send out the questionnaires before the end of the campaign to give us a chance to anodize the parts according to the supporters' wishes and be ready to ship as soon as possible.
See you soon.
Graziano

content.title: production update
content.creator:
YOGAPOD
February 22, 2025
content.content:
good morning,
We give you a new update:
All the main blocks for the Kickstarter campaign have been processed, both the numbered and unnumbered series, and we have already started with the final phase.
The rubber parts are already being processed. At the moment, we see no hiccups ahead.
We thank you for your support, we will not let you down.
Until next time
Graziano
you are in good hands

content.title: you begin to see the first pieces
content.creator:
YOGAPOD
February 20, 2025
content.content:
We have started working on the first batch of yogapods in order to fulfil all possible bookings in the Kickstarter campaign and to be able to deliver as promised.
We will update you again in the coming days.
Your trust fills us with energy.
Please help us spread the word about this Kickstarter campaign.
We thank you!
Graziano

content.title: production begins
content.creator:
YOGAPOD
February 15, 2025
content.content:
The yogapod is new and is being born in an Italian company, one of those family businesses where passion and competence come first.
We have always focused on doing our job well and we realise that we still have a lot to learn in marketing.
That is why we decided to make you as much a part of this moment as possible, to do our best to earn your trust.
Yesterday the material arrived to start production, and today processing began.
Until the next update!

content.title: YOGAPOD goal in 1 day!
content.creator:
YOGAPOD
February 14, 2025
content.content:
we have worked hard and enthusiastically over the past few months, and it was a great joy to see that the goal we had set ourselves was achieved in just one day.
We thank everyone who is helping to make this project known.
We are already moving to start production.
Our momentum is at its peak.
We will update you tomorrow
Graziano
